pageProduct.name: QV Face Exfoliating Polish 150G
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Ego QV Face Exfoliating Polish with avemide 15 ™

Smoothes and revitalises for dry / sensitive skin.

Checklist:

- Gently removes impurities and dead skin cells
- Visibly smoothes and instantly revitalises
- Invigorates skin renewal
- Avemide 15 ™ calms and soothes the skin
- Gentle enough for every day use
- Suitable for dry or sensitive skin
- Dermatologically tested
- Safflower Oil replenishes moisture levels
- Vitamin E provides anti-oxidant benefits
- Vitamin B3 Complex reduces skins sensitivity
- Enhanced PCa+ minimises fine lines and wrinkles

Directions

Apply desired amount of QV Face Exoliating Polish to damp, clean skin.

Using circular motions, gently massage the face and neck, avoiding the delicate areas around the lip and eye contour.

Rinse with warm water.

For best results, use in conjunction with other products from the QV Face range for the ideal skincare regime.
